name: Hidden Magic
detailed_description: This is a game in genre "Hidden Objects".The story begins and you go in search of parts of the artifact in various parts of the world to find the hidden and find out the secret. You expect dozens of locations, hundreds of items, and many hours fastened by the plot of the gameplay. An unusual alternation of the list of items to be searched for - text or a figure - will not let you get bored either. Control of the game is a classic mouse. There is the possibility of using hints.A lot of gameplay hours included. Enjoy!
